DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct prospective , randomize , double blind study compare effectiveness intravenous paracetamol dexketoprofen prevent pain first 24 hour postoperative period adult patient undergoing septoplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Paracetamol Compared Dexketoprofen Postoperative Analgesia After Septoplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Postoperative pain score measure Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) ( 0 represent pain 10 bad pain ever experience ) 15 , 30 , 60 minute 2th , 4th , 6th , 12th 24th hour postoperatively .
DOC.criteria: After patient 's inform consent approve , total 70 ASA ( American Society Anesthesiology ) physical status I II adult patient age 18 65 undergoing septoplasty plan include study . History clot disorder blood dyscrasia , Gastrointestinal ulcer chronic dyspepsia , History allergy study drug , Active bleed bleed disorder .
